title: Salmon Avocado Sushi Roll
directions: Wrap bamboo mat in plastic wrap.
Place nori sheet shiny-side down on the mat.
Spread sushi rice evenly over the nori, leaving a 1-inch strip at the top.
Lay salmon slices and avocado slices across the center of the rice.
Roll tightly using the bamboo mat, tucking the filling as you go.
Wet a sharp knife and slice the roll into 6-8 pieces using a single clean downward motion (do not saw). Wet the knife between each cut.
notes: This is the baseline roll - nail this one first. Use short-grain Japanese sushi rice (Calrose) for best results. Slice salmon cold, right before assembling. Thaw frozen salmon slowly in the fridge for 24 hours before use.
